casebody.data:
622 A.2d 1194 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Bruce Alan KRAIN. Misc. Docket (Subtitle BV) No. 10,

Sept. Term, 1993.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Consent to Disbarment April 14, 1993.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Consent to Disbarment from the practice of law filed by Bruce Alan Krain, in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 14th day of April, 1993

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Bruce Alan Krain, be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Bruce Alan Krain, from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
